decks.notes: The deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana quickly through rituals and medallions to cast spells like Grapeshot or Ral, Monsoon Mage multiple times in a turn, allowing for a powerful combo finish. It also utilizes card draw and graveyard recursion with Past in Flames to maintain resources and consistency. The deck aims to win the game through explosive turns of casting multiple spells in a single turn to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing Amulet of Vigor to ramp up mana quickly and efficiently, allowing for explosive plays with Primeval Titan and Scapeshift to search for powerful lands like Urza's Saga. It aims to establish a strong board presence with the Titan and generate value from lands like Vesuva and Lotus Field. The inclusion of cards like Boseiju, Who Endures and Cultivator Colossus provide additional utility and resilience. Overall, the deck aims to assemble a powerful combination of lands and creatures to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes efficient creatures like Ragavan and Seasoned Pyromancer, alongside removal spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm. The deck also includes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Arena of Glory to create additional pressure on the opponent. By utilizing a mix of creatures, burn spells, and combat tricks, this deck aims to quickly deal damage to the opponent and secure victory before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck focuses on using ramp spells like Utopia Sprawl and Ancient Stirrings to quickly play powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. The deck also includes control elements like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to disrupt the opponent's strategy. By combining ramp and control elements, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful Eldrazi creatures while controlling the board and protecting itself from threats.

The main idea behind this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck focuses on playing low-cost creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to quickly build a board presence and pressure the opponent. Cards like Galvanic Discharge and Ocelot Pride provide additional reach and removal to finish off the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker for added value and versatility. Overall, the key strategy is to be fast and relentless in attacking the opponent.

This deck focuses on assembling the Broodscale Bloodchief combo by utilizing cards like Ancient Stirrings and Urza's Saga to find key pieces like Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker. Blade of the Bloodchief and Malevolent Rumble serve to bolster the combo's power and control the board with Walking Ballista. Kozilek's Command and Boseiju, Who Endures provide disruption and protection, while cards like Gemstone Caverns and Prismatic Vista ensure consistent mana production. The key strategy is to quickly assemble the combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize a landless combo strategy to disrupt and control the opponent while building up resources and ultimately winning the game with powerful combos involving cards like Goblin Charbelcher and Lotus Bloom. The deck focuses on utilizing a mix of counter spells, disruption, and card draw to outmaneuver the opponent and secure a win through a well-timed combo. It also includes specific cards like Fallaji Archaeologist and Tameshi, Reality Architect to further support the combo strategy and ensure victory.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay, utilizing a combination of creatures and spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy while applying pressure. By combining powerful creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Emperor of Bones with disruption tools like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, the deck aims to control the board and quickly close out the game. Additionally, cards like Relic of Progenitus provide graveyard hate against opposing strategies, while Ephemerate allows for additional value and protection of key creatures. The deck aims to outpace opponents and keep them on the back foot throughout the game.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo involving creatures like Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker, supported by cards like Blade of the Bloodchief and Urza's Saga. The deck aims to control the board with removal and disruption spells like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command while setting up its combo pieces to overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End adds versatility and power to the deck, making it a formidable force in Modern 1 vs 1 matchups.

The key idea of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using efficient and low-cost spells while keeping up the pressure with a mix of cheap creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and powerful threats like Dragon's Rage Channeler. The deck aims to be fast and aggressive, utilizing cheap cantrips and burn spells to maintain card advantage and snowball the board in its favor. The mana base is designed to support this aggressive strategy by maximizing consistency and speed.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble a powerful combo using cards like Ancient Stirrings, Basking Broodscale, and Blade of the Bloodchief to generate a strong board presence. Cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Malevolent Rumble help control the game while Eldrazi Temple and Urza's Saga ramp up mana for big plays like Emrakul, the Promised End. The deck also utilizes cards like Prismatic Vista and Boseiju, Who Endures for consistent search and protection. Overall, the strategy revolves around creating a dominant board presence and overwhelming the opponent with powerful combos and control elements.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana using cards like Amulet of Vigor and Arboreal Grazer, while also utilizing lands like Gruul Turf and Simic Growth Chamber to generate additional resources. The goal is to efficiently search for key combo pieces like Primeval Titan and Scapeshift in order to bring out powerful threats such as Cultivator Colossus and Aftermath Analyst. By using land manipulation and combo synergies, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with large creatures and game-changing spells.

This deck aims to use the synergy between Basking Broodscale and Blade of the Bloodchief to create a powerful combo. By playing cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Haywire Mite, the deck can quickly build up a threatening board presence. Using cards like Ancient Stirrings and Prismatic Vista helps to find key pieces of the combo, while Boseiju, Who Endures protects important spells from counters. With access to strong removal like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble, this deck is capable of controlling the game until it can execute its game-winning combo.

This Mardu Aggro deck aims to quickly pressure the opponent with a mix of efficient creatures and disruptive spells. Utilizing a combination of removal spells like Fatal Push and Prismatic Ending, along with hand disruption like Thoughtseize, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying threats like Solitude and Ketramose, the New Dawn to quickly close out the game. The addition of planeswalkers like Kaya, Orzhov Usurper and Liliana, the Last Hope provide additional value and flexibility in dealing with various threats, making it a versatile and aggressive deck in Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to establish board control through aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, while using cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge to clear the way for them. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury provide additional support and power to the deck. Additionally, cards like Seasoned Pyromancer and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker help with card advantage and consistency. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and burn spells to secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to quickly build a threatening board presence and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By efficiently casting cheap artifacts and utilizing cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble for card advantage, the deck aims to outpace and outvalue the opponent. With cards like Mox Opal and Urza's Saga providing ramp and synergy with artifacts, the deck can quickly establish a powerful board state and put pressure on the opponent to keep up or fall behind.
